title: Dar receives message from Qatar’s Minister, regarding regional situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Wednesday received a message from Minister of State for Foreign Affairs of Qatar Dr. M. Abdulaziz Al-Khulaifi regarding the regional situation.
Dr. Al-Khulaifi appreciated Pakistan’s constructive engagement in fostering regional peace and security, a press release issued by the Foreign Office Spokesperson said.
The DPM/FM thanked him for Qatar’s consistent support and its positive role in advancing peace in the region and beyond.
